q: strongest sign yet that Gbagbo had failed to convert African unease over possible military intervention, as threatened by ECOWAS, into a reversal of U.N.-certified results showing rival Alassane Ouattara won the presidential election on November 28. The decision that they took was to try once more a peaceful effort to remove Gbagbo, not to legitimize Gbagbo. That is out of the question, James Victor Victor Gbeho , president of the ECOWAS Commission, told journalists. Unequal Technologies makes several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. regrets of another domineering defense secretary-- the late Robert McNamara -- who came to describe the Vietnam War as`` terribly wrong.''`` That's not the case with Iraq,'' Donald Rumsfeld countered. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the Al-Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he added, insisting the President Bush administration's decision to invade Iraq in the wake of the September 11, 2001 attacks on the United States was`` incremental,'' not rushed.
